read.title: Reading: Energy in Oman
read.passage: Oman uses many types of energy technology. In Masirah, solar panels capture light energy from the sun and transform it into electrical energy. In Dhofar, wind turbines use kinetic energy from moving air. The wind turns the blades (mechanical energy), which then produces electrical energy. Water dams store potential energy. When water flows down, potential energy becomes kinetic energy, then mechanical energy to power generators. Understanding these diagrams helps us see how energy transforms!
